summary: Game project with Caffeine map feature - debugging black screen issue on tablet by implementing on-screen debug UI and foolproof CSS
architectural_notes: MapView uses Maptalks.js loaded from CDN (1.0.0-rc.28)
Map image hosted on GitHub Raw (IMG_8296.webp, 3408x1922px)
On-screen debug UI implemented for tablet testing without DevTools
Map container uses inline styles to prevent 0px height collapse
ImageLayer events captured: resourceloaderror and layerload
known_issues: Black screen on Caffeine map (tablet) - debugging with on-screen UI
Potential issues: CDN loading, image CORS/rate limits, or zoom/extent misconfiguration

existing_features.title: Replace the map container's className-based styling with hardcoded inline styles to prevent height collapse: width: '100vw', height: '100vh', position: 'absolute', top: 0, left: 0, backgroundColor: '#111', zIndex: 0
Update map initialization camera settings to safe values: center at [1704, 961], zoom level 1, and pitch 0 degrees for flat view
Add on-screen debug UI overlay with lime green text on semi-transparent black background positioned at top-left (top: 80px, left: 20px, zIndex: 9999) displaying real-time debug messages

Implement event capture to update on-screen debug messages: display map dimensions 500ms after initialization, capture and display ImageLayer 'resourceloaderror' events as 'IMAGE LOAD ERROR (CORS or Link)', and capture 'layerload' events as 'IMAGE LOADED OK'
